name: BeerLeague GM
description:
WELCOME TO BEERLEAGUE.

A Basketball Simulation Boardgame with up to 6 human players.

Features:

-Play through 5-15 seasons
-Up to 6 players.
-Roll through the Early and Mid season all the way to the playoffs.
-Quick Game simulation.
-Sign Free Agents.
-Develop your players.
-Trade players for assets or cash.
-Create-a-Rookie.
-9 Original team logos.
-Single game elimination playoffs.
-Over 100 original players and coaches.
-Over 8 original tunes produced by BDG
